incrementOnNullAssertion.ts(5,5): error TS2322: Type '{}' is not assignable to type 'Dictionary<number>'.
  Index signature for type 'string' is missing in type '{}'.


==== incrementOnNullAssertion.ts (1 errors) ====
    interface Dictionary<T> {
        [myFavouriteType: string]: T | undefined
    }
    const x = 'bar'
    let foo: Dictionary<number> = {}
        ~~~
!!! error TS2322: Type '{}' is not assignable to type 'Dictionary<number>'.
!!! error TS2322:   Index signature for type 'string' is missing in type '{}'.
    if (foo[x] === undefined) {
        foo[x] = 1
    }
    else {
        let nu = foo[x]
        let n = foo[x]
        foo[x]!++
    }
